preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh and prepare each metal according to the specified amounts (400 g Cu, 200 g In, 80 g Sc, 80 g Zr). 
 2. Place the metal pieces into a clean, dry mixing container. 
 3. Use a mechanical mixer or hand mixer to blend the metals uniformly, ensuring a consistent mixture.
